--- title: "Data Wrangling" author: "Nandan rajkumar" --- #Load Libraries ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_d36347e4c05113adac98df0b832c0443'} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> ── Attaching core tidyverse packages ──────────────────────── tidyverse 2.0.0 ── #> ✔ dplyr 1.1.2 ✔ readr 2.1.4 #> ✔ forcats 1.0.0 ✔ stringr 1.5.0 #> ✔ ggplot2 3.4.2 ✔ tibble 3.2.1 #> ✔ lubridate 1.9.2 ✔ tidyr 1.3.0 #> ✔ purrr 1.0.1 #> ── Conflicts ────────────────────────────────────────── tidyverse_conflicts() ── #> ✖ dplyr::filter() masks stats::filter() #> ✖ dplyr::lag() masks stats::lag() #> ℹ Use the conflicted package () to force all conflicts to become errors ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(vroom) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> #> Attaching package: 'vroom' #> #> The following objects are masked from 'package:readr': #> #> as.col_spec, col_character, col_date, col_datetime, col_double, #> col_factor, col_guess, col_integer, col_logical, col_number, #> col_skip, col_time, cols, cols_condense, cols_only, date_names, #> date_names_lang, date_names_langs, default_locale, fwf_cols, #> fwf_empty, fwf_positions, fwf_widths, locale, output_column, #> problems, spec ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(data.table) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> #> Attaching package: 'data.table' #> #> The following objects are masked from 'package:lubridate': #> #> hour, isoweek, mday, minute, month, quarter, second, wday, week, #> yday, year #> #> The following objects are masked from 'package:dplyr': #> #> between, first, last #> #> The following object is masked from 'package:purrr': #> #> transpose ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(tictoc) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> #> Attaching package: 'tictoc' #> #> The following object is masked from 'package:data.table': #> #> shift ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} library(dplyr) library(readxl) ``` ::: # Define column types for vroom ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_bb24549244947b5271932f59b5bfcb67'} ```{.r .cell-code} col_types <- list( id = col_character(), type = col_character(), number = col_character(), country = col_character(), date = col_date("%Y-%m-%d"), abstract = col_character(), title = col_character(), kind = col_character(), num_claims = col_double(), filename = col_character(), withdrawn = col_double() ) ``` ::: # The reduced data set for the year 2014 # Read the data into a tibble ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_b7baa5e709b242cd1e1975f73cd68803'} ```{.r .cell-code} patent_tbl <- vroom( file = "C:/Users/srajs/OneDrive/Desktop/Business/ss23-bdsb-Nandan31/assets/wrangling/Patent_data_reduced/patent.tsv", delim = "\t" #col_types = col_types, #na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Rows: 327014 Columns: 3 #> ── Column specification ──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── #> Delimiter: "\t" #> chr (1): id #> dbl (1): num_claims #> date (1): date #> #> ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data. #> ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message. ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} assignee_tbl <- vroom( file = "C:/Users/srajs/OneDrive/Desktop/Business/ss23-bdsb-Nandan31/assets/wrangling/Patent_data_reduced/assignee.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: number, #> country, date, abstract, title, kind, num_claims, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} patent_assignee_tbl <- vroom( file = "C:/Users/srajs/OneDrive/Desktop/Business/ss23-bdsb-Nandan31/assets/wrangling/Patent_data_reduced/patent_assignee.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: id, type, #> number, country, date, abstract, title, kind, num_claims, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ```{.r .cell-code} uspc_tbl <- vroom( file = "C:/Users/srajs/OneDrive/Desktop/Business/ss23-bdsb-Nandan31/assets/wrangling/Patent_data_reduced/uspc.tsv", delim = "\t", col_types = col_types, na = c("", "NA", "NULL") ) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stderr} ``` #> Warning: The following named parsers don't match the column names: id, type, #> number, country, date, abstract, title, kind, num_claims, filename, withdrawn ``` ::: ::: #Joining the tables ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_a8914684874785002462e78219ba407f'} ```{.r .cell-code} patent_joined_table <- patent_assignee_tbl %>% inner_join(assignee_tbl, by = c("assignee_id" = "id")) %>% inner_join(patent_tbl, by = c("patent_id" = "id")) ``` ::: #What US company/corporation has the most patents? List the 10 US companies with the most assigned/granted patents. ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_0f5ecc1db70d7689016b0839007d0df9'} ```{.r .cell-code} us_patent_counts <- patent_joined_table %>% group_by(organization) %>% summarise(total_patents = n()) %>% arrange(desc(total_patents)) top_10_us_companies <- head(us_patent_counts, 10) top_10_us_companies ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: ::: #What US organization had the most patents granted in August 2014? List the top 10 companies with the most new granted patents for August 2014. ::: {.cell hash='03_data_wrangling_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_e65fa46d2f261a6969c93579a9bb3ed4'} ```{.r .cell-code} us_patent_counts_aug_2014 <- patent_joined_table %>% filter(format(date, "%Y-%m") == "2014-08") %>% group_by(organization) %>% summarise(total_patents = n()) %>% arrange(desc(total_patents)) %>% select(organization, total_patents) top_10_us_companies_aug_2014 <- head(us_patent_counts_aug_2014, 10) top_10_us_companies_aug_2014 ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: :::
